Widgets available for locking
In the System, it is possible to lock the functionality of a widget under certain conditions. This condition is set by an
algorithm
when
placing the widget
. Locking is available for
widgets that involve custom actions
.
The user can define a locking algorithm for the following widgets:
"Object registry" widget
- when the widget is locked, the registry will be available for viewing only;
"Task list" widget
- when the widget is locked, the task registry will be available for viewing only. The registry control panel buttons will not be displayed;
"Dashboard" widget
- when the widget is locked, the dashboard becomes unavailable, appearing as a simple read-only table or an image;
"Button" widget
- when the widget is locked, pressing the button is not possible;
"Voting buttons" widget
- when the widget is locked, its buttons are inactive;
"Checkbox with a hyperlink" widget
- when the widget is locked, selection is not possible;
"Attribute table" widget
- when the widget is locked, the table becomes locked. The table data is available for viewing only;
"Financial statements" widget
- when the algorithm is applied, data fields are locked;
"File agreement" widget - when the widget is locked, its buttons are locked;
"File hierarchy" widget
- when the widget is locked, custom actions become unavailable, including attaching and deleting files;
"Explorer" widget
- when the widget is locked, custom actions become unavailable, including signing, attaching, and deleting files.
